game.name: RIGOR
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Hellbit is a fast-paced roguelike about survival through movement and temptation. You play as a small devil who discovers a living sword that hungers to rule Hell. Dodge, slash, and survive as the blade’s will slowly takes control.
